00026 void Session::createBool(CUrl url, cstr description, PropertyOptions options)
00027     throw (InvalidOperation)
00028 { createStorage("RBool", url, description); setPropertyOptions(url, options); }
00029

00031     throw (InvalidOperation)
00032 { createStorage("RBool", url, description, new RBool(defaultValue)); setPropertyOptions(url, options); }

00050 void Session::createDouble(CUrl url, cstr description, RDouble::Unit unit, PropertyOptions options)
00051     throw (InvalidOperation)
00052 {
00053     createStorage("RDouble", url, description);
00054     getProperty(url)->defaultDoubleUnit = unit;
00055     setPropertyOptions(url, options);
00056 }
00057 
00058 void Session::createDouble(CUrl url, cstr description, RDouble::Unit unit,
00059     double defaultValue, PropertyOptions options)
00060     throw (InvalidOperation)
00061 {
00062     createStorage("RDouble", url, description, new RDouble(defaultValue, unit));
00063     getProperty(url)->defaultDoubleUnit = unit;
00064     setPropertyOptions(url, options);
00065 }

00173 // ENUMS
00174 
00175 void Session::createEnum(CUrl url, cstr description,
00176     const vector<PropertyEnumItem>& items,
00177     uint defaultValue, PropertyOptions options)
00178     throw (InvalidOperation)
00179 {
00180     createStorage("RInt", url, description, new RInt(defaultValue));
00181     Property* p = getProperty(url);
00182     Profiler::lock((sessionName + ":" + url).c_str());
00183     p->lock(HERE);
00184     p->enumItems = items;
00185     p->isEnumB = true;
00186     p->unlock();
00187     Profiler::unlock((sessionName + ":" + url).c_str());
00188     setPropertyOptions(url, options);
00189 }
00190 
00191 void Session::setEnum(CUrl url, uint value) throw (InvalidOperation, NoSuchProperty, WrongType)
00192 {
00193     setObject(url, new RInt(value));
00194 }
00195 
00196 bool Session::isEnum(CUrl url) throw (InvalidOperation, NoSuchProperty)
00197 {
00198     return getProperty(url)->isEnum();
00199 }
00200 
00201 string Session::getEnumString(CUrl url)
00202     throw (InvalidOperation, NoSuchProperty, WrongType, ValueNotSet)
00203 {
00204     Property* p = getProperty(url);
00205     Profiler::lock((sessionName + ":" + url).c_str());
00206     p->lock(HERE);
00207     uint v;
00208     try {
00209         v = p->getObjectAsLC<RInt>()->value;
00210     }
00211     catch (const SessionException& e) {
00212         p->unlock();
00213         Profiler::unlock((sessionName + ":" + url).c_str());
00214         throw e;
00215     }
00216     for (size_t i = 0; i < p->enumItems.size(); i++) {
00217         if (p->enumItems[i].value == v) {
00218             p->unlock();
00219             Profiler::unlock((sessionName + ":" + url).c_str());
00220             return p->enumItems[i].name;
00221         }
00222     }
00223     p->unlock();
00224     Profiler::unlock((sessionName + ":" + url).c_str());
00225     return "<unknown>";
00226 }
